mdRecord.dcterms:description: "By Wright's own definition, this was the first of the Prairie houses - the rooms are elevated, and there is no basement. On September 14, 1972 the Frank Thomas House was added to the U.S. National Register of Historic Places." -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Thomas_House [work]
